link.title: 74 Things That Blew Our Minds in 2022
link.desc: Some of these were pretty mindblowing! Hope you all have a great 2023.

image.alt: A comic from smbc-comics.com showing a conversation between (presumably) a Gen-X and a Gen-Alpha, where the Gen-X talks about how their generation had hope that the internet would fix everything, and the Gen-Alpha reacts by asking whether everyone was stupid back then for believing that an internet protocol would solve everything
